Question.Subject: Does anyone know what is a good site for a 12 year old?
Question.Content: I'm 12 and i need a new site for me, the website Polyvore is getting boring and i am not a load to have a facebook so does anyone know any good sites for me?? Please help!!!!!!
Question.ChosenAnswer: If you like to win and have fun. Swagbucks. Its just like google. As you search you randomly win swagbucks that are good to purchase prizes from the swagstore. I use my swagbucks to purchase amazon gift cards. Ive made way over $50 in amazon. Try it out! http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/Rundee

Answer.Content: Roiworld Stardoll Miniclip Games2win TY Girls And there is this game which you have to type into google just type THE IMPOSSIBLE QUIZ which i think is the one which will get you thinking ! : ) Hope i helped
okay there i a site called lockerz email me for more info FREE STUFF
